00036 MMPTE MmPteGlobal = {0x0}; // Set global bit later if processor supports Global Page
00037 
00038 //
00039 // Note - MM_PTE_GLOBAL_MASK is or'ed into ValidKernelPte during
00040 // initialization if the processor supports Global Page.  Use
00041 // ValidKernelPteLocal if you don't want the global bit (ie: for session
00042 // space).
00043 //
00044
